meanings.definition: A tree of the bignonia family, native to tropical America, with clusters of purple flowers.
meanings.sent1: The jacarandas in the park bloom beautifully every spring.
meanings.sent2: I love walking under the jacarandas and admiring their purple flowers.
meanings.sent3: The jacarandas in the garden seem to be having a purple party!
meanings.sent4: Her dress was as vibrant as a cluster of jacarandas in full bloom.
meanings.sent5: The scent of the jacarandas filled the air, making it feel magical.

meanings.definition: The wood of this tree, used for making furniture.
meanings.sent1: The table was crafted from sturdy jacarandas wood.
meanings.sent2: The cabinet gleamed with a rich jacarandas finish.
meanings.sent3: The carpenter joked that the jacarandas wood was too fancy for a simple chair.
meanings.sent4: The jacarandas wood seemed to whisper stories of the forest.
meanings.sent5: The touch of the jacarandas wood was smooth and comforting.
